lead_paragraph: SHAPIRO--Daniel. The Officers, Board and Staff of the Jewish Community Relations Council of New York mourn the loss of a dedicated and visionary Jewish communal leader. We are most fortunate and grateful that Dan devoted his keen intellect, skills and reputation to our founding 40 years ago. May his wife, Ellen, sons Jonathan, Andrew, and Peter, sister Rena Olshansky, and their families be comforted among the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. Ronald G. Weiner, President; Charles S. Temel, President-Elect; Michael S. Miller, Executive VP & CEO 1/3
